9466.en:
<voice 02120_00009466><start_lip_sync n00295 _normal m00001>Ethene's survivor...
I've found you.<stop_lip_animation n00295 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9466.ja: <voice 02120_00009466><start_lip_sync n00295 _normal m00001>「……見つけたぞ　エテーネの民の生き残りよ。<stop_lip_animation n00295 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9466.ko: <voice 02120_00009466><start_lip_sync n00295 _normal m00001>: ……찾았다. 에테네에서 살아남은 자여.<stop_lip_animation n00295 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9466.zh-Hans: <voice 02120_00009466><start_lip_sync n00295 _normal m00001>……终于找到你了，伊甸之民的幸存者。<stop_lip_animation n00295 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9466.zh-Hant: <voice 02120_00009466><start_lip_sync n00295 _normal m00001>……終於找到你了，伊甸子民倖存者。<stop_lip_animation n00295 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9467.en:
<voice 02170_00009467><start_lip_sync n00295 _normal m00001>You all pose a threat, so I
cannot allow any of you to live...<stop_lip_animation n00295 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9467.ja:
<voice 02170_00009467><start_lip_sync n00295 _normal m00001>「貴様たちは　危険な存在……
　ひとりたりとも　生かしてはおけぬ……。<stop_lip_animation n00295 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9467.ko:
<voice 02170_00009467><start_lip_sync n00295 _normal m00001>: 네놈들은 위험한 존재……
　단 한 명도 살려 둘 수 없다…….<stop_lip_animation n00295 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9467.zh-Hans:
<voice 02170_00009467><start_lip_sync n00295 _normal m00001>你们非常危险……
一个活口都不能留……<stop_lip_animation n00295 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9467.zh-Hant:
<voice 02170_00009467><start_lip_sync n00295 _normal m00001>你們這種人相當危險……
一個活口都不能留……<stop_lip_animation n00295 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9468.en:
<voice 02830_00009468><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>...You have been dozing for quite
a while.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9468.ja: <voice 02830_00009468><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「……ずいぶん　うなされていたのう。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9468.zh-Hans: <voice 02830_00009468><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……你呻吟得很痛苦啊。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9468.zh-Hant: <voice 02830_00009468><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……真是痛苦的呻吟啊。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9469.en:
<voice 02915_00009469><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Ya' seem to be havin' a bad dream.
Wanna tell the old man about it?<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9469.ja:
<voice 02915_00009469><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「なにか悪い夢でも　見ていたようじゃが
　よかったら　このジジイに　聞かせてくれんか？<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9469.ko:
<voice 02915_00009469><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 무슨 나쁜 꿈이라도 꾼 모양인데
　괜찮다면 이 노인네에게 얘기해 주겠나?<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9469.zh-Hans:
<voice 02915_00009469><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>是不是做了什么噩梦啊，
能不能和我这糟老头讲讲？<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9469.zh-Hant:
<voice 02915_00009469><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>是不是做了什麼惡夢？
要不要跟我這糟老頭講講？<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9470.en:
<pc> told Sage Hollow
about the dream.
9470.ja:
<pc>は　賢者ホーローに
夢の内容を　語った。
9470.zh-Hans:
<pc>对贤者霍洛
描述了梦的内容。
9470.zh-Hant:
<pc>對賢者霍洛
描述了夢的內容。

9471.en:
<voice 03095_00009471><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>I see. In yer dream, Nergel said
something like that...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9471.ja:
<voice 03095_00009471><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「……なるほどのう。
　夢の中で　ネルゲルが　そんなことを……。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9471.ko:
<voice 03095_00009471><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: ……그랬구먼.
　꿈속에서 네르겔이 그런 말을…….<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9471.zh-Hans:
<voice 03095_00009471><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……原来如此啊。
梦境中内尔格尔那么说啊……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9471.zh-Hant:
<voice 03095_00009471><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……原來如此。
夢裡的內爾格爾是那麼說的啊……<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9472.en:
<voice 03250_00009472><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>It seems that the situation is more
serious and dangerous than I thought.
I can't stay calm!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9472.ja:
<voice 03250_00009472><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「どうやら　事態は　思っていた以上に
　シリアスかつ　デンジャーなようじゃな。
　こりゃ　ノンビリしておれん！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9472.ko:
<voice 03250_00009472><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 아무래도 사태가 예상보다 더
　시리어스하고 데인저한 모양일세.
　이거 여유 부릴 때가 아니구먼!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9472.zh-Hans:
<voice 03250_00009472><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>看来事态比想象中
还要危险和严峻啊。
没时间再在这里闲聊了！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9472.zh-Hant:
<voice 03250_00009472><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>看來情況比想像中
還要嚴重和險峻啊。
那就沒時間在這裡瞎耗了！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001112.en:
<voice 03254_19001115><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001><cs_pchero> there is one key
emblem left to collect. It's in the windy
City of Azlan! Let's get to it!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001112.ja:
<voice 03254_19001115><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「<cs_pchero>よ！　残り１つ　
　風の町アズランのキーエンブレムを
　ハリーハリーで　手に入れるのじゃ！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001112.ko:
<voice 03254_19001115><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: <cs_pchero>! 마지막 하나
　바람의 마을 아즐란의 키 엠블럼을
　허리허리해서 손에 넣도록 하게!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001112.zh-Hans:
<voice 03254_19001115><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>！
还剩下１个，尽快取得
风城安须岚的键徽吧！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001112.zh-Hant:
<voice 03254_19001115><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001><cs_pchero>！
還剩下１個，盡快取得
風城安須嵐的鑰徽吧！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

9473.en:
Next stop: Mount Gatara~ Gatara~. Please make sure you have not forgotten anything before you get off
the bus.
9473.ja:
<voice 03375_00033045><start_lip_sync n00875 _normal m00001>「次は～　岳都ガタラ～　ガタラ～。
　お降りのお客さまは　お忘れ物のなきよう
　今一度　ご確認の上　ご降車ください。<stop_lip_animation n00875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9473.ko:
<voice 03375_00033045><start_lip_sync n00875 _normal m00001>: 다음 역은~ 산악 도시 가타라~ 가타라~
　내리시는 승객분께서는 두고 내리는
　물건이 없는지 다시 한번 확인하시기 바랍니다.<stop_lip_animation n00875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9473.zh-Hans:
<voice 03375_00033045><start_lip_sync n00875 _normal m00001>前方到站是山城加塔拉，加塔拉。
要下车的旅客，下车时
请别忘了随身行李。<stop_lip_animation n00875 CLOSE_MOUTH>
9473.zh-Hant:
<voice 03375_00033045><start_lip_sync n00875 _normal m00001>下一站～～山城加塔拉～～加塔拉～～
要下車的旅客，下車時請別忘了隨身行李。<stop_lip_animation n00875 CLOSE_MOUTH>

33055.en:
<voice 03600_00033057><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Oops, at Gatara Station, I was
supposed to buy the famous Gatara Pig
Buns. That's what's important now!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
33055.ja:
<voice 03600_00033057><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「……おっと　しかし　岳都ガタラ駅では　
　名物のガタラのブタまんを　買うんじゃった。
　今は　そちらが　先決じゃ！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
33055.ko:
<voice 03600_00033057><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: ……어이쿠, 하지만 산악 도시 가타라역에서는 
　명물인 가타라의 돼지고기 만두를 사야 하는데.
　지금은 그쪽이 더 급해!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
33055.zh-Hans:
<voice 03600_00033057><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……哎呀，不过应该在山城加塔拉站
购买特产加塔拉猪肉包。
现在这件事最重要！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
33055.zh-Hant:
<voice 03600_00033057><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>……哎呀，不過應該在山城加塔拉車站
購買名產加塔拉豬肉包。
現在這件事最重要！<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

19001543.en:
<voice 03829_00009476><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>Ye must gather all 5 key emblems
as soon as possible. I'll be makin' me
own preparations meanwhile...<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001543.ja:
<voice 03829_00009476><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「おぬしは　一刻も早く
　キーエンブレムを　5個集めるのじゃぞ。
　わしは　わしで　準備を進めておくからな。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001543.ko:
<voice 03829_00009476><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 자네는 한시라도 빨리
　키 엠블럼 5개를 모으게나.
　난 나대로 준비를 할 테니.<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001543.zh-Hans:
<voice 03829_00009476><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>你尽快去收集
５个键徽吧！
我这边也会做好准备的。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
19001543.zh-Hant:
<voice 03829_00009476><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>你盡快去收集
5個鑰徽吧。
我這邊也會做好準備的。<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>

33066.en:
<voice 03915_00033066><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>So I bid ya' adieu for today.
See ya' again when the tracks of
destiny cross!<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
33066.ja:
<voice 03915_00033066><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>「では　今日のところは　お別れじゃ。
　運命の線路が交差するとき　また　会おう！
　<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
33066.ko:
<voice 03915_00033066><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>: 그럼 오늘은 이만 헤어지세.
　운명의 선로가 교차할 때 다시 만나세!
　<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
33066.zh-Hans:
<voice 03915_00033066><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>那么今天就在此作别吧。
待命运之轨再度交汇时再见吧！
<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
33066.zh-Hant:
<voice 03915_00033066><start_lip_sync n00598 _normal m00001>那今天就先告辭了，
待命運之軌交會時再見吧！
<stop_lip_animation n00598 CLOSE_MOUTH>
